name: Surfing Champs
description:
Want to join Ultimate Surfers League? Get your feet on the board and put your hands on this multi-player version of Flick Champions Extreme Sport!

Meet the surfers from around the world, challenge them, or master the maneuvers alone and meet them again when the time is right.

Experience the climate of a tropical island, listen to the sound of the rushing stream, and surf your way to victory, wave after wave, splash after splash...

Slide, jump on the ramps, avoid whirlwinds and do not let yourself crash on the rock. Be carried by water currents to maximize your score-combos. Collect power-ups and enter the ultra-dexterous mode to perform even more amazing shunts and acrobatics!

Considered as the most enjoyable of all Water Sports, this Flick Champions-Powered approach to Surfing is a perfect combination of a sport game, arcade and the endless runner.


FEATURES:
► Real-time multiplayer arcade cross-platform surfing
► Solo, rank-boosting mode
► Instant pick-up and play with extremely slick controls
► Vibrant, modern, High-Definition graphics
► Global Ranking of the best (and worst! :) Surfers
► Smooth, lightweight and User-friendly


Stay tuned for more online multiplayer sporting events, powered by Flick Champions ™!
